text:
Вие получавате този email в следствие на това, че сте се абонирали за услугата
'Получаване на справки по електронна поща'. Ако това съобщение не е предназначено
за вас, моля свържете се с централата на Общинска Банка АД.

You have received this e-mail due to your subscription to the service [ Receipt of reports through e-mail ].The contents of this e-mail and any attachments to it are confidential. They may also be legally privileged.If you are not an addressee or have received this message in error, access to it is unauthorised. Please notify the sender as soon as possible by replying to this e-mail. In addition, we would be grateful if you would delete the message together with any attachments and all copies from all locations in your computer and on your system. If you are not an intended recipient, any review, distribution, copying, circulating or other use of this communication or the information in it is prohibited and may be unlawful.There is a possibility that data may be corrupted or altered during transmission. Accordingly, if you wish to rely on any information contained in this message, you should request written confirmation from the sender.This e-mail and its attachments have been swept by our own virus checking system. However, we cannot guarantee that it is virus-free and cannot take responsibility for any virus, which may be present. We suggest that you also sweep this e-mail and its attachments to satisfy yourself that your system will not be harmed by any of its contents.
